activities:
TrialNetworks is a clinical trials technology and services solution provider. TrialNetworks helps customers to accelerate the drug development process through a number of innovative technology services.
TrialNetworks may obtain the following personal information: Name, Phone Number, Email, Organization, Organization Address, Degree, Internet Protocol (IP) address.
TrialNetworks may use this data to establish and maintain client and business relationships to provide access to internet based activities; and conduct other legitimate activities as necessary or appropriate in connection with the Software as a Service (SasS) solutions provided. 
TrialNetworks may also obtain certain clinical trial data. This data is anonymized and cannot be attributed to a particular person.
contactoff1: 383 Elliott Street Suite G, Newton MA, 02464
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Clinical trial and user account information
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) for any unresolved complains involving residents of their respective jurisdictions
